title: Bali All-Inclusive Wellness Villas with Daily Spa Treatments, Wellness Consultations & Return Airport Transfers
description:
Experience laid-back luxury at one of Bali's premier wellness sanctuaries, nestled in the tranquil village of Bebengan. Ideally situated between the seaside sunsets of Canggu and the serene landscapes of Ubud, this sanctuary offers a highly personalised and uniquely tailored health and wellness experience. With just eight villas, this luxury boutique resort combines accommodation with purpose.

When you need a moment of indulgence and uninterrupted bliss, treat yourself to rejuvenating Ayurvedic treatments, yoga sessions and meditation classes. Take a dip in the sparkling outdoor pool and savour cuisine from the resort's wellness-backed menus, featuring organic produce grown in the onsite vegetable garden, personalised to your wellness goals.
offer_address: Banjar Bebengan, Tangeb, Abianbase, Mengwi Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia

title: Uluwatu Self-Contained Pool Villas near Dreamland Beach with Daily Breakfast
description:
Retreat to a luxurious home-away-from-home at these Cycladic-inspired villas in Uluwatu. Boasting inner courtyards with lap pools and gardens, your villa has everything you need for a serene escape. 

Rent a bicycle for the day and head to the nearby beaches including the shores of Cemongkak and Dreamland, book a morning yoga session and take advantage of the complex's in-villa dining service with a la carte breakfast each morning.
offer_address: Jalan Pendem, Banjar Dinas Kauh, Pecatu, Kec Kuta Selatan, Badung, Bali 80363, Indonesia

title: Tranquil Self-Contained Villas Near Canggu with Private Pool and Garden Views
description:
Experience the tranquillity of these modern private villas at this secluded sanctuary. Nestled in the heart of Badung, each villa is the epitome of curated Balinese design, with stark stone walls and refined wooden furniture contrasting against the azure waters of the private pool.

Wake up to the gentle sounds of the nearby creek, recline on your private terrace with a lush garden, and then take full advantage of Umalas Creek's sauna, jacuzzi and cold-plunge pool. End your day by venturing out of your villa to savour authentic Indonesian cuisine at the nearby warungs and restaurants.
offer_address: Jalan Umalas II, Kerobokan, Kuta Utara, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
